info.title: SimplyTransport
info.description:
SimplyTransport - An API for retrieving transport information.

This API provides access to transport data for agencies, routes, stops, trips, stop times, calendars, calendar dates, shapes, realtime information, schedules, maps, and statistics.

These endpoints are extensions of the GTFS standard with some additional endpoints for additional features such as maps and statistics.

exception_type.description: Determines whether the service is added or removed on the date

direction.description: Direction of travel. Mapping between agencies could differ.

route_type.description: Indicates the type of transportation used on a route

location_type.description: Indicates the type of the location

delay_in_minutes.description: Delay in minutes (rounded to 1 decimal place)
Delay in minutes (rounded to 1 decimal place)

direction.description: Direction of travel. Mapping between agencies could differ.

tags.name: Agency
tags.description: Agencies are the operators of transport services

tags.name: Route
tags.description: Routes are a group of trips that display to riders as a single service

tags.name: Stop
tags.description: Stops are the places where transport services pick up and dropoff riders

tags.name: Trip
tags.description: Trips are a sequence of two or more stops that occur at specific times

tags.name: StopTime
tags.description: StopTimes are when a vehicle arrives at and departs from stops for each trip.

tags.name: Calendar
tags.description: Calendars are the weekly schedules of a route

tags.name: CalendarDate
tags.description: CalendarDates are the exceptions to a calendar

tags.name: Shape
tags.description: Shapes define the path that a vehicle travels along a route

tags.name: Realtime
tags.description: Realtime information provides the current status of a STOP

tags.name: Schedule
tags.description: Schedule provides the static schedule of a STOP

tags.name: Map
tags.description: Maps will be returned as iframes

tags.name: Statistics
tags.description: Statistics provides summaries of the data

tags.name: Events
tags.description: Events are records of tthings that have happened in the system

tags.name: Delays
tags.description: Delays are records of when a vehicle is late or early
